did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of Guy Davenport, 1987, Accession # 10539-o, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred from the Rare Book Division on April 18, 1989.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This addition to the Guy Davenport Collection contains material pertaining to the author's book The Jules Verne Steam Balloon.

did.unittitle: The Jules Verne Steam Balloon, nine stories by Guy Davenport: North Point Press advance 1987
did.physdesc: TMs, uncorrected page-proof copy, orange soft cover, 150 p.
